title: WORLD RECORD! Fastest footspeed ever achieved by a human!
author: Remi B
description: The fastest human footspeed was recorded by Usain Bolt at 27.8mph. Recently I broke that record.

localize.description: 人类最快的脚步速度是由Usain Bolt记录的27.8mph。最近，我打破了这一纪录。
localize.title: 世界纪录！人类有史以来最快的脚步速度!

localize.description: 人類最快的腳步速度是由Usain Bolt記錄的27.8mph。最近，我打破了這一紀錄。
localize.title: 世界紀錄！人類有史以來最快的腳步速度!
